root.message: The STAT_CONC_DEF field for indicator 4-5-1, translated into en
root.data:
Equality index in education and training is the ratio between the value of an indicator of education and training of one population group compared to another population group. The group at greater risk of disadvantage is usually placed in the numerator. The closer the index value is to 1, the higher the equality between the two groups; The closer to 0 the greater the inequality.

The equality index in education and training is approached according to the following factors: Gender, ethnicity.
